text: Enemies of the Celestial Empire shall face divine punishment.
Enchanted urns filled with whale oil and phosphorus create streams of fire under the push of gunpowder.
Monks amplify their Yin Wind spell from atop the tower, creating a devastating vortex against single enemies in its range.
Improved rockets, known as Dragon Surge, possess excellent range and power, annihilating any enemy infantry in sight.
Servants equipped with shortbows fire poisoned arrows from concealed positions, harassing the enemy with toxic volleys.
Crowded with overworked serfs, the tower houses several trebuchets for constant bombardment.
A bloated "Old Daisy" is launched via powerful slings, spreading filth and stench among the enemy. Not highly damaging but immensely demoralizing.
A divine blade shoots forth, imbued with blessings to banish all evil and impurity.
A scorching fireball launches from the tower, creating whirlwinds of flames to sweep nearby enemies.
Specially designed lava cannons melt enemy infantry with precision from the tower's height.
Screaming rockets with sharp tips deliver devastating damage to large enemies.
Slowly crossing the sky, this meteor will be the last beauty the enemy witnesses.
Molten metal flows strip enemy armor, rendering even the most armored knights defenseless.
Fireballs rain from the infernal skies, delivering catastrophic punishment to clustered foes.
Hellcannon imbued with shadow power craves countless souls.
Fused with the power of the four gods, this cannon obliterates all resistance.
Huge ballistae originally meant to hunt Naggaroth sea beasts now pierce large foes effortlessly.
Wails of anguish and pain emit from the tower, followed by a gaze that triggers a powerful explosion.
A massive battery from a Black Ark relentlessly assaults the foolish enemies.
A dark strike, infused with shadow power, annihilates anything daring to threaten the Black Tower.
That throw was far, but where did my ale bottle go?
The mightiest beasts would fear a shot from this small hammer projectile.
What did you say? More water? I mean ale, ale!
High explosives inscribed with destructive runes await detonation in this massive powder keg.
Grenade launchers rain destruction from atop the tower, bolstering the Empire's infantry lines.
Calibrated mortars deliver precise area bombardment, scattering infantry clusters in panic.
Relentless salvos of cannonballs penetrate multiple cavalry units, turning beasts into pulp.
Enchanted beams within the tower coalesce into a banishing light, obliterating foes of the Empire.
Hey, let's welcome them properly. Feed them before cutting them down.
Shout louder, boys! Fly high and give the enemy a big hug!
Take this punch! No, wait, it's a kick!
Asur archers struggle in confined spaces, resorting to harassing tactics.
The Eagle Claw Bolt Thrower deals immense piercing damage, even against armored Chaos warriors.
Elven Princesses master volley tactics, delivering enchanted arrows for massive damage.
Mages channel a magical projectile, fracturing foes upon impact.
Hulking warriors vent their frustration of missing melee combat by hurling axes from the tower.
More skulls! No heads? I'll fetch one myself!
A cluster of skulls bursts in the air, showering destruction like a deadly rain.
None dare question Khorne's fury or survive his wrath.
Ice Guard stationed atop the tower unleash arrows to slow enemy advances.
Winter greets invaders with a deadly kiss.
A massive Little Grom cannon installed in a clocktower signals the alarm in its own destructive way.
Ursun's power envelops all who trespass Kislev.
Skinks hide in the jungle, weakening enemies with poisoned blowpipes.
Fire jars hurled by Skinks excel at breaking up enemy formations.
Ancient flames deliver significant armor-piercing damage.
A colossal solar engine atop the temple tower channels the will of the Old Ones through its beams.
Norscan winds end all signs of life from southerners.
Clean? Ha-ha! Fungus is born from the belly!
Rotting skulls burst on impact, spreading decay among enemies.
That's not filth; it's condensed bile!
Rolling Nurgling clusters deliver Father Nurgle's gifts to the unworthy.
Greenskin junk piles bombard enemies, turning trash into treasure.
Leadbelchers lazily reload massive cannons, their lethargy unmatched only by their firepower.
Even the Overtyrant applauds as trash from this catapult crushes enemy heads.
This massive bronze cannon has crushed countless titan skulls and will once again echo through the valleys.
Don't hold it upside down! Throw it now!
This... this is a Big Big Horned Rat Firework!
The grotesque tower's javelins leave enemies pale with dread.
Dense volleys of javelins strike in vulnerable spots, disrupting enemy ranks.
Fragments tear through flesh, leaving enemies lost in agony.
The greatest torment lies within the void of dreams.
Undead sentinels silently claim all who dare approach the sands.
Shrieking skulls burst, scattering vengeful spirits across the battlefield.
A mighty bone bow launches arrows capable of piercing any armor.
Feel the ancient curses of the desert sands emanating from the casket.
Mischievous horrors hurl dimensional flames with reckless glee from this eerie tower.
Dimensional fire capable of melting flesh and metal erupts, mutating those scorched.
Gaze upon the blue flames; guess how many will be struck down!
Can you see it? The truth of the worldâ€”yes, open your eyes!
Plenty of powder! What's a battlefield without smoke?
This soul-charged round will pierce fragile human decks and resolve alike!
How will you face a storm upon your very soul?
The caliber matches her name! Long live the Queen!
Sharp and angular, this bone spear seems torn from a strange beast.
Within this ominous tower, Nagash's gaze looms upon intruders.
Cold iron cages hold shrieking spectral bats, delivering attacks of dual physical and spiritual agony.
Powerful javelins pierce nearby foes, but the range is notably short.
Waywatcher volleys arrive through magical circles, devastating enemies like a torrential rain.
Arrows blessed by the Hunter God pursue prey stepping into his traps.
The spirit of the woods fuels these doom darts, turning enemies into nourishment for Athel Loren.
